text: Guy Stuart Ritchie (born 10 September 1968) is a British director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in Hatfield, Hertfordshire. Ritchie's films are: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch, Swept Away, Revolver, RocknRolla, Sherlock Holmes and Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows. Ritchie had a son with Madonna in August 2000. They were married from December 2000 until they divorced in December 2008. He lives with model Jacqui Ainsley (born 1981).
